thread.title: BRIEF-Lundin Gold Says Lundin Family Trusts Collectively Hold 22.3 Pct Of Co's Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lundin Gold Says Lundin Family Trusts Collectively Hold 22.3 Pct Of Co's Shares

organizations.name: brief-lundin gold says lundin family trusts collectively hold 22.3 pct of co

text:
May 24 (Reuters) - Lundin Gold Inc:
* LUNDIN FAMILY TRUSTS RESTRUCTURE HOLDINGS IN LUNDIN GOLD * LUNDIN GOLD - LORITO HAS TRANSFERRED 8.5 MILLION COMMON SHARES AND ZEBRA HAS TRANSFERRED 1.2 MILLION COMMON SHARES OF LUNDIN GOLD TO NEMESIA S.Ã€.R.L.
* LUNDIN GOLD INC - ZEBRA HOLDS 37.8 MILLION SHARES, NEMESIA HOLDS 9.7 MILLION SHARES OF CO
* LUNDIN GOLD INC - LORITO NO LONGER HOLDS COMMON SHARES OF LUNDIN GOLD
* LUNDIN GOLD INC - LUNDIN FAMILY TRUSTS COLLECTIVELY HOLD 22.3% OF ISSUED AND OUTSTANDING COMMON SHARES OF COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
